oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Meridian Street at Douglas Avenue, 1957
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of a view down Meridian Street at Douglas Avenue, 26 March 1957. Archway Bakery is visible on the right. The area was included in the East Nashville Urban Renewal Project (Project Tenn. R-13). Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.);
